god_message: Welcome, mortal, to the realm of light and prophecy. What quest brings you to seek the favor of Apollo?

choice_1.choice_description: Seek Apollo's insight into the future to better prepare for the war.
choice_1.god_message: Ah, foresight is a gift and a burden. But your pursuit of knowledge is commendable.

choice_1.choice_description: Ask for a prophecy that could reveal the outcome of the war.
choice_1.god_message: Prophecy is a delicate weave. I shall reveal a thread, though its meaning may be obscure.

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to interpret the prophecy with wisdom and discretion.
choice_1.god_message: Wisdom in interpretation is key. Reflect well on my words.

choice_2.choice_description: Seek clarification on the prophecy's most cryptic elements.
choice_2.god_message: Understanding requires patience and insight. I shall watch your endeavors.

choice_3.god_message: Demands do not sway the visions. The future remains shrouded.

choice_2.choice_description: Inquire how best to use this knowledge to gain an advantage.
choice_2.god_message: Knowledge shapes destiny. Use it to guide, not to dictate.

choice_1.choice_description: Plan to share the insights with allies to strengthen bonds.
choice_1.god_message: Sharing light can forge strong alliances. Proceed with care.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest keeping the prophecy secret to maintain an upper hand.
choice_2.god_message: Secrecy can be powerful, yet divisive. Consider the path you choose.

choice_3.choice_description: Propose using the prophecy to intimidate enemies.
choice_3.god_message: Intimidation shadows the truth. Beware the consequences.

choice_3.choice_description: Request a personal prophecy to ensure victory in a specific battle.
choice_3.god_message: The fates of battles are complex, intertwined with countless threads.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer to dedicate the battle victory to Apollo's glory.
choice_1.god_message: Dedication is noble. I shall consider aligning the threads in your favor.

choice_2.choice_description: Promise to build a temple in his honor with the spoils of war.
choice_2.god_message: Temples stand as beacons of faith. Your offer holds merit.

choice_3.choice_description: Threaten to forsake him for another god if denied.
choice_3.god_message: Faith that wavers under threat is no faith at all. Reflect on your devotion.

choice_2.choice_description: Appeal to Apollo's love of music and poetry, offering a grand performance.
choice_2.god_message: Art and music are the essence of life. Your tribute intrigues me.

choice_1.choice_description: Compose an epic that glorifies Apollo's deeds.
choice_1.god_message: An epic in my honor? Such creativity may indeed catch my favor.

choice_1.choice_description: Ensure the epic is performed throughout the land.
choice_1.god_message: Spread the word of my deeds, and let the people rejoice in the telling.

choice_2.choice_description: Ask for Apollo's divine inspiration to perfect the composition.
choice_2.god_message: Seeking divine muse? Your humility and dedication shall be rewarded.

choice_3.choice_description: Boast that this epic will surpass all others, even those favored by Apollo.
choice_3.god_message: Ambition is to be admired, but hubris shadows the heart. Tread carefully.

choice_2.choice_description: Promise to dedicate a festival of music and arts in his honor.
choice_2.god_message: A festival to celebrate the arts is a worthy endeavor. Let us see if it aligns with destiny.

choice_1.choice_description: Involve artists and musicians dedicated to Apollo's worship.
choice_1.god_message: Devoted followers enhance the splendor of the festivity. A promising proposal.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest a competition to find the best new hymn for Apollo.
choice_2.god_message: Competition breeds excellence. Your idea holds potential.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim the festival will make Apollo more popular than Dionysus.
choice_3.god_message: Rivalry among gods is not the foundation of true worship. Reflect on your intentions.

choice_3.choice_description: Offer to build a monument that captures Apollo's beauty and skill.
choice_3.god_message: A monument to immortalize my essence? Your ambition is as vast as the sky.

choice_1.choice_description: Collaborate with the finest sculptors and artists for its creation.
choice_1.god_message: Such collaboration honors both the divine and the craft. I shall consider your offer.

choice_2.choice_description: Ensure the monument stands at the site of a major victory.
choice_2.god_message: Monuments mark history's turning points. Your plan will be weighed.

choice_3.choice_description: Vow that its beauty will eclipse even the sun.
choice_3.god_message: Even the sun cannot be eclipsed by mortal hands. Beware pride, for it often precedes a fall.

choice_3.choice_description: Implore Apollo for healing and protection against the plague ravaging your lands.
choice_3.god_message: Plague and sickness challenge both mortal and divine. Your plea has reached my ears.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer prayers and sacrifices to Apollo for his intervention.
choice_1.god_message: Your faith and devotion shine brightly. Such acts cannot be ignored.

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to honor Apollo with a temple to health and healing.
choice_1.god_message: A temple dedicated to healing is a sanctuary of hope. Your vow is noted.

choice_2.choice_description: Initiate a campaign to improve public health in his name.
choice_2.god_message: Actions in my name that bring healing are worthy. I will observe your progress.

choice_3.choice_description: Warn that the people's faith may wane without divine assistance.
choice_3.god_message: Faith tested by trials may falter, but it is through action, not threats, that favor is earned.

choice_2.choice_description: Seek a divine artifact to cure the afflicted.
choice_2.god_message: Artifacts of divine nature hold great power. Their use must be weighed with care.

choice_1.choice_description: Pledge to use the artifact only for the common good.
choice_1.god_message: Your pledge aligns with the virtues of compassion and duty. Let it be so.

choice_2.choice_description: Propose to study the artifact to advance medical knowledge.
choice_2.god_message: Advancing knowledge is noble, but some secrets are not meant for mortals.

choice_3.choice_description: Suggest that the artifact could grant you power over life and death.
choice_3.god_message: Power over life and death is not a plaything. Consider your words carefully.

choice_3.choice_description: Beg Apollo to personally visit and heal the sick.
choice_3.god_message: A personal appeal to the god of healing is bold. The scales of fate will measure your request.

choice_1.choice_description: Vow to spread tales of his mercy and compassion.
choice_1.god_message: Tales of divine mercy inspire faith. Your commitment will be remembered.

choice_2.choice_description: Promise to lead a reformation of worship practices in his honor.
choice_2.god_message: Reformation requires dedication. I shall see if your actions match your words.

choice_3.choice_description: Threaten to renounce him if he does not comply.
choice_3.god_message: Renunciation is a grave step. Reflect on the path of faith and where it truly leads.

bonus_question.god_message: How many satellites has NTU designed, built and sent into Earth's orbit till date?

choice_1.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_2.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_3.god_message: Very good. I shall consider your request. Return to your world, mortal.
